ayas.arabic: لَمْ يَكُنِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِنْ أَهْلِ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ وَٱلْمُشْرِكِينَ مُنفَكِّينَ حَتَّىٰ تَأْتِيَهُمُ ٱلْبَيِّنَةُ
ayas.translation: Those who reject (Truth), among the People of the Book and among the Polytheists, were not going to depart (from their ways) until there should come to them Clear Evidence,-
ayas.transliteration: lam yakunil ladhīna kafarū min ahlil kitābi wal mushrikīna munfakkīna ḥattā ta-tiyahumul bayyinah

bismillah.translation: In the name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful.

ayas.arabic: رَسُولٌ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ يَتْلُوا۟ صُحُفًا مُّطَهَّرَةً
ayas.translation: An messenger from Allah, rehearsing scriptures kept pure and holy:
Wherein are laws (or decrees) right and straight.

ayas.arabic: وَمَا تَفَرَّقَ ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُوا۟ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ إِلَّا مِنۢ بَعْدِ مَا جَآءَتْهُمُ ٱلْبَيِّنَةُ
ayas.translation: Nor did the People of the Book make schisms, until after there came to them Clear Evidence.
ayas.transliteration: wa mā tafarraqal ladhīna ūtul kitāba illā min ba`di mā jā-at humul bayyinah

ayas.arabic: وَمَآ أُمِرُوٓا۟ إِلَّا لِيَعْبُدُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ مُخْلِصِينَ لَهُ ٱلدِّينَ حُنَفَآءَ وَيُقِيمُوا۟ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَيُؤْتُوا۟ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ ۚ وَذَٰلِكَ دِينُ ٱلْقَيِّمَةِ
ayas.translation: And they have been commanded no more than this: To worship Allah, offering Him sincere devotion, being true (in faith); to establish regular prayer; and to practise regular charity; and that is the Religion Right and Straight.
ayas.transliteration: wa mā umirū illā liya`budullāha mukhliṣīna lahud dīna ḥunafā-a wayuqīmuṣ ṣalāta wayu-tuz zakāh ۚ wadhālika dīnul qayyimah

ayas.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِنْ أَهْلِ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ وَٱلْمُشْرِكِينَ فِى نَارِ جَهَنَّمَ خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ ۚ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمْ شَرُّ ٱلْبَرِيَّةِ
ayas.translation: Those who reject (Truth), among the People of the Book and among the Polytheists, will be in Hell-Fire, to dwell therein (for aye). They are the worst of creatures.
ayas.transliteration: innal ladhīna kafarū min ahlil kitābi wal mushrikīna fī nāri jahannama khālidīna fīhā ۚ ulā-ika hum sharrul bariyyah

ayas.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمْ خَيْرُ ٱلْبَرِيَّةِ
ayas.translation: Those who have faith and do righteous deeds,- they are the best of creatures.
ayas.transliteration: innal ladhīna āmanū wa`amiluṣ ṣāliḥāti ulā-ika hum khayrul bariyyah

ayas.arabic: جَزَآؤُهُمْ عِندَ رَبِّهِمْ جَنَّـٰتُ عَدْنٍ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ أَبَدًا ۖ رَّضِىَ ٱللَّهُ عَنْهُمْ وَرَضُوا۟ عَنْهُ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ لِمَنْ خَشِىَ رَبَّهُۥ
ayas.translation: Their reward is with Allah: Gardens of Eternity, beneath which rivers flow; they will dwell therein for ever; Allah well pleased with them, and they with Him: all this for such as fear their Lord and Cherisher.
ayas.transliteration: jazā-uhum `inda rabbihim jannātu `adnin tajrī min taḥtihal-anhāru khālidīna fīhā abadā ۖ raḍiyallāhu `anhum waraḍū `anh ۚ dhālika liman khashiya rabbah
